spec_data.Name: Rex
spec_data.Description:
(R)?ex(ify) is an automation tool on basis of the Perl scripting language. You
can use it in your everyday DevOps life for:

	* Continous Delivery
	* Configuration Management
	* Automation
	* Cloud Deployment
	* Virtualization
	* Software Rollout
	* Server Provisioning
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Tue 01 Aug 2017 09:32:07 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Tool for Automation, Remote Execution and Configuration Deployment
